title: Guess Your Location does not return valid nearby restrooms
description: The Guess your location tool should show stuff nearby your location by distance order, currently its showing stuff on the opposite side of the country. Related PRs: https://github.com/RefugeRestrooms/refugerestrooms/pull/112 https://github.com/RefugeRestrooms/refugerestrooms/pull/110 https://github.com/RefugeRestrooms/refugerestrooms/pull/107
